DataElement.preferredName: Lymphedema and Breast Cancer Questionnaire Have Tenderness No Action Performed Checkbox Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated indication of taking no action because of tenderness in their arm, breast, or chest, using a single character text field.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Lymphedema and Breast Cancer Questionnaire Have Tenderness No Action Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A condensed version of a self-administered or structured interview questionnaire designed specifically for evaluating lymphedema symptoms after surgery for breast cancer._A question about whether an individual has or had tenderness._The non-affirmative response to a question.__A thing done._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A condensed version of a self-administered or structured interview questionnaire designed specifically for evaluating lymphedema symptoms after surgery for breast cancer.

Concepts.definition: A condensed version of a self-administered or structured interview questionnaire designed specifically for evaluating lymphedema symptoms after surgery for breast cancer.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)
